member.name: T:DomainRelay.Transport.RabbitMQ.Routing.IOutboxRouter
member.summary: Determines where/how to publish a given outbox envelope.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.Transport.RabbitMQ.Routing.TypeKeyTopicRouter
